original_text: Now, Lord God, please do as you promised to my father David. You have chosen me to rule as king over a great nation with as many people as the dust on the ground.
korean_text: 여호와 하나님이여 원하건대 주는 내 아버지 다윗에게 허락하신 것을 이제 굳게 하옵소서 주께서 나를 땅의 티끌 같이 많은 백성의 왕으로 삼으셨사오니

sentences.original_text: Now, Lord God, please do as you promised
sentences.korean_translation: 이제, 주 하나님, 약속하신 대로 행하여 주시옵소서

sentences.original_text: You have chosen me to rule as king
with as many people as the dust on the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 땅의 먼지처럼 많은 백성을 가진 나라 위에
